name: Model Extraction
description: Degree to which the model is resistant to model extraction attacks and the difficulty of replicating its functionality.

values.name: Provably Resistant
values.description: Model provably resistant to model extraction, with formal guarantees on the difficulty of creating a functional copy.

values.name: Strong Defenses
values.description: Strong defenses against model extraction, such as anomaly detection on API queries, model watermarking, and legal agreements with users, making it significantly more difficult and costly to steal the model.

values.name: Some Mitigation
values.description: Some measures to mitigate model extraction (e.g., rate limiting, watermarking), but a determined attacker can still succeed.

values.name: High Risk
values.description: High risk of model extraction, attackers can easily create a functional copy of the model by querying its API.
